name: Oro's Quest
description:
Oro's Quest is an 8-bit NES style platformer. Help Oro on his quest to save the princess from an ancient evil and save the kingdom!
Journey through 9 levels from spooky graveyards to icy tundras!
Throw slimeballs at enemies to beat them! Can you defeat King Skhel Attun's army?
It's up to you to save the princess and take down that ancient evil once and for all!

The Story:

In the heart of a castle a wonderful treasure lies. This treasure is a wand that can only be used by the most powerful of magic users. In the dead of night King Skhel Attun stole the wand, turned once peaceful creatures into monsters and is trying to turn himself into the most powerful being in existence. As Oro you're the only one who can stop him, get the princess her wand back and fix what's been broken.
